head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BARNES, ARTHUR HART

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BARNES, ARTHUR HART

block.p: BARNES-Arthur Hart. Age 63, of Ithaca, N.Y. Formerly of Garden City, N.Y. Died unexpectedly on October 25, 1997. Graduated Downers Grove (IL) High School '52, Cornell University College of Arts and Sciences '56, School of Law '60, NYU Advanced Degree in Tax Law. Served as President, Board Member, and Treasurer of Cornell Club of Long Island. Board of Directors, Legal Aid Society of Nassau County. Member, MineolaGarden City Rotary Club for 20 years. Survived by wife Joan, mother Rosemary, brothers Frederick and Peter, and children Arthur, Christopher, and Amanda. In lieu of flowers, donations would be appreciated to the Cornell University Office of Student Aid Development, 55 Brown Road, Ithaca, NY 14850. Visitation Wednesday 10/29/ 97, 9:00 AM to 10:30 AM at The Williams Funeral Home, 99 Newtown Lane, East Hampton, N.Y. Funeral Wednesday at 11 A.M., Most Holy Trinity RC Church. Interment to follow in the Parish Cemetery.
